## Description {#details}

Helper for check-and-exit error handling.

For tool use only. NOT FOR USE IN LIBRARY CODE.

Definition at line 1430 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/error-h">Error.h</a>.

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> Err. If it&#39;s in a failure state log the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error(s)</a> and exit.

### operator()() {#a6264c39c5fb7ca84b07ff31fb4d02782}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>T llvm::ExitOnError::operator() (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected</a>&lt; T &gt; &amp;&amp; E) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> E.

If it&#39;s in a success state then return the contained value. If it&#39;s in a failure state log the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error(s)</a> and exit.

  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> E.

If it&#39;s in a success state then return the contained reference. If it&#39;s in a failure state log the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/symbolrecordmapping-cpp/#a9cdf893c7d17e47fa1ed8bebf92a5da4">error(s)</a> and exit.
